description: A collection of extended parser functions for MediaWiki, particularly including functions for dealing with lists of values separated by a dynamically-specified delimiter.

LstmapExpansionCompat.description: Use true to expand token and pattern variables only after token replacements in {{#lstmap}}. Use false to expand variables the same way as {{#listmap}}.

LstFunctionNamedExpansionCompat.description: Use 'old' to only allow numbered parameters in {{#lstmap}}, {{#lstmaptemp}}, {{#lstsrt}}, and {{#lstuniq}}. Use 'tracking-old' to also track parameters that may be confused as named parameters. Use 'new' to allow both numbered and named parameters.
